entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1200 metres late in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
